name: Ominous blind date
description:
You go on a blind date but didn't realize you were going on three different dates. Pick one of three normal dates. Get to know them and their deepest, and darkest secrets. Just kidding.  (Contains disturbing characteristic features and topic about abusive relationship) 

The dates:

Credits: Art/characters/story/programing by Notaghosty

 music: (all from https://uppbeat.io/) 

 normal scenes music: Ryan-Walz 

 main menu/Good ending music: Poem-Sounddroll

 Normal ending music: spatial- Fugu Vibes 

 Bad ending music: Turn away-Yeti music
